detectors.description:
BalancerARIpool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#676-691) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#682)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#685)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BalancerARIpool.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#662-665):

	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#663)
		- tokenstake.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#592)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#353)

		- ari.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#671)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#353)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#664)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#614)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#664)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#613)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#664)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#670)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#616)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#664)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerARIpool.sol#617)
